original_text: Wisdom is good with an inheritance: and by it there is profit to them that see the sun.
korean_text: 지혜는 유산 같이 아름답고 햇빛을 보는 자에게 유익이 되도다

sentences.original_text: Wisdom is good with an inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜는 유산과 함께 있을 때 좋다

sentences.original_text: and by it there is profit
to them that see the sun
